Address.label: Address
Address.value: 25821 INDUSTRIAL BOULEVARD SUITE 400, HAYWARD, California, 94545, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: AcelRx Pharmaceuticals Inc is a specialty pharmaceutical company focused on the development and commercialization of therapies for use in medically supervised settings. Its product portfolio includes DSUVIA and Zalviso for Moderate-to-severe acute pain. The company's products under pipeline are ARX-02 and ARX-03. The majority of its revenue is generated from DSUVIA product sales in the United States.
